derivation: from G4012 (περιέρχομαι) and G2064 (περιέρχομαι) (including its alternate);
kjv_def: fetch a compass, vagabond, wandering about
strongs_def: to come all around, i.e. stroll, vacillate, veer
outline:
1. to go about
    1. of strollers
    2. of wanderers
    3. of navigators (making a circuit)
